590810.name: Command Ops 2: Bloody Hürtgen Vol. 8
590810.description: Bloody Hürtgen highlights the key battles of the Allied offensives in the late Fall of 1944 to clear the Hürtgen Forest; a dismal and dreary area of wooded hills southeast of the German city of Aachen. Can you, as the Allied commander, clear the way through the dense forests and rolling hills to secure a jump off point for the final drive to the Rhine? Or will you, as the German commander, successfully delay the Allied advance and make them pay in blood for every meter of the fatherland that falls into their hands?
